abstract: Olympic runner Oscar Pistorius walks without aid of his artificial legs in South African courtroom, clear bid for sympathy in his effort to request leniency as he faces sentencing for conviction for 2013 murder of Reeva Steenkamp.

headline.print_headline: Pistorius Removes His Artificial Legs at Sentencing Hearing
headline.main: Oscar Pistorius Removes His Artificial Legs at Sentencing Hearing

snippet: Mr. Pistorius’s lawyers were trying to highlight the sense of vulnerability they say he felt when, acting out of fear and confusion, he fatally shot his girlfriend.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Pistorius’s lawyers were trying to highlight the sense of vulnerability they say he felt when, acting out of fear and confusion, he fatally shot his girlfriend.
